channel.title: [pi] how to make tax bags
channel.description: Can anyone help me with a tutorial or something on how to make "tax bags". This way you can store up to 2147m into them and get more.

item.title: [pi] how to make tax bags
item.dc:creator: @is_u_mad_bro is u mad bro
item.description:
@is_u_mad_bro wrote:

[quote=“mr rawwrz, post:3, topic:411380”]add this into you clickitem.java, that will make it so u can fill them with 2147m, and then empty the tax bag to get the money back out of it.

if(itemId == 10831) { if(c.getItems().playerHasItem(995,2147000000)) { c.getItems().deleteItem(995, 2147000000); c.getItems().deleteItem(10831,1); c.getItems().addItem(10835,1); c.sendMessage("You fill the bag with 2147m."); } else { c.sendMessage("You need 2147m to fill this bag."); } } if(itemId == 10835) { c.getItems().deleteItem(10835, 1); c.getItems().addItem(995,2147000000); c.getItems().addItem(10831,1); c.sendMessage("You empty the bag and recieve 2147m."); }[/quote]

Are you being serious?!

if someone buys two of those cash bags and fill up one abd bank the item purchase another one.
your Gf’d

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] how to make tax bags
item.dc:creator: @mr_rawwrz mr rawwrz
item.description:
@mr_rawwrz wrote:

add this into you clickitem.java, that will make it so u can fill them with 2147m, and then empty the tax bag to get the money back out of it.

if(itemId == 10831) { if(c.getItems().playerHasItem(995,2147000000)) { c.getItems().deleteItem(995, 2147000000); c.getItems().deleteItem(10831,1); c.getItems().addItem(10835,1); c.sendMessage("You fill the bag with 2147m."); } else { c.sendMessage("You need 2147m to fill this bag."); } } if(itemId == 10835) { c.getItems().deleteItem(10835, 1); c.getItems().addItem(995,2147000000); c.getItems().addItem(10831,1); c.sendMessage("You empty the bag and recieve 2147m."); }

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] how to make tax bags
item.dc:creator: @_tyco +tyco+
item.description:
@_tyco wrote:

best thing to do is add the tax bag to a shop that buys and sells and make it worth 2147m then you can stockpile them without breaking max cash and you can sell to shop as and when you need the cash if you dont know how to do that ill be happy to help ;-p
+tyco+

Read full topic
